meanings.definition: A piece of furniture with drawers for storing clothes.
meanings.sent1: My mom bought a new dressers for my room to keep my clothes organized.
meanings.sent2: The antique dressers in the bedroom were beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent3: The dressers in the house were always full of surprises - you never knew what you would find inside!
meanings.sent4: Her dressers were like treasure chests, holding memories and secrets within their wooden confines.
meanings.sent5: The dressers in the store were all different colors and sizes, making it hard to choose just one.

meanings.definition: A person who dresses someone else, especially in a theatrical production.
meanings.sent1: The dressers backstage helped the actors quickly change costumes between scenes.
meanings.sent2: The dressers in the theater were skilled at handling elaborate costumes and quick changes.
meanings.sent3: The dressers were like magical wardrobe fairies, transforming the actors into different characters with each outfit change.
meanings.sent4: She was a master dresser, ensuring each actor looked perfect before stepping on stage.
meanings.sent5: The dressers worked behind the scenes, making sure the actors were always ready for their next entrance.

meanings.definition: A person who dresses wounds or performs medical procedures.
meanings.sent1: The nurse was a skilled dressers, efficiently tending to the injured patients.
meanings.sent2: The dressers in the emergency room worked tirelessly to care for the wounded.
meanings.sent3: The dressers in the hospital were like healing artists, soothing pain with their gentle touch.
meanings.sent4: He was known as the fastest dresser in the medical team, always ready to assist in surgeries.
meanings.sent5: The dressers in the clinic were compassionate and precise in their treatment of injuries.

meanings.definition: A type of salad dressing or sauce.
meanings.sent1: The creamy dressers on the salad made it taste delicious.
meanings.sent2: She always liked a light vinaigrette dressers on her salads.
meanings.sent3: The dressers on the salad danced with the fresh vegetables, creating a flavorful ensemble.
meanings.sent4: The zesty dressers added a burst of flavor to the otherwise plain salad.
meanings.sent5: The tangy dressers perfectly complemented the crisp lettuce and juicy tomatoes.

meanings.definition: A tool used for smoothing or shaping wood.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used a dressers to create intricate designs on the wooden table.
meanings.sent2: He carefully selected the right dressers to achieve a smooth finish on the cabinet.
meanings.sent3: The dressers glided over the rough wood, leaving behind a polished surface.
meanings.sent4: With the dressers in hand, he transformed the raw timber into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The dressers was essential for shaping the delicate curves of the chair legs.
